adHeader: Road trip to OK in Oct
adDetails: Planning a trip to OK city Lawton Leaving EastBay 12 Oct Leaving OK Oct. 20-21 returning to the EastBay- Prefer a FEMALE clean nonsmoker no drugs ect. for company on ride to and from OK will drop off OK on arrival and pickup on 20-21st for return trip Me Clean nonsmoker Sr. white male new safe suv Share Gas --Lodging and food Ect.are seperate Would Have to meet prior to check each other out for safety reasons I-5 SR99 I-15 I-40E sr287 sr 256 sr62 sr281 Lawton PlanedRoute stops Kingman AZ onite Tucumcari NM onite Lawton OKcity Iwill be driving a max of 10HR. per day Route could be changed with no problem
